name: Promenade (saperate)
description:
Lore: 

Your mother just kicked you out of the house because apparently you need to breathe "real air" and "touch grass"..

Note: i made this game as a challenge to myself to finally finish a game and learn about unity

Features:

  • Music (With credits to their respective author!)
  • Pause Menu (Accessed through pressing the escape button)
  • Settings (Don't like the default sensitivity? No Problem!)
  • Trees (You now have access to a secret feature called oxygen)
  • Color (You aren't color blind anymore)
  • Terrain (You can walk on something now good job!)
  • Rocks (Do i really need to describe this to you? They're rocks goddammit)
  • Log Cabin (The very house you were kicked out of!)
  • Post processing (oOo so pretty!)
